title: The Bog
description: Before arriving in the Circle, Gigi Monroe lived in a magical flare called the Bog. This forsaken place was the home to many damned creatures including Mamma Celeste, Millicent, Daniel, and Gigi's lost love, Wolf. Learn all of Gigi's secrets from her first breath in the grip of evil to a childhood filled with joy and darkness to the reason she left the Bog and moved to the Circle.The Bog is a Gigi Monroe novella scheduled for release in April of 2013.
author: Angela Horn
